name: Avali LoRA
description:
This is LoRA trained on images of the wacky sc-fi bird species known as Avali. Model is rather new, probably will receive future versions.

Not much else to say but trigger words are: avali, avian
You may get better results with phrases like feathers, tail feathers, multi ear, four ears, wing arms

It appears to somewhat biased towards clothing, put clothing and armor in the negative prompt, and naked in the positive. That may help getting Avalis without clothing.

Features a medium trained version on 2500 steps, and a harder trained version on 3200 steps. Both have their strengths, I recommend getting both. Inpainting also works quite well, I recommend taking advantage of it.

meta.prompt: cartoony, anime style, scenery, village, outdoors, sky, clouds, solo, avali, avian, small, standing, digitigrade, detailed face, detailed eyes, orange feathers, orange fur, smile, male, digitigrade, talons, arm wings, tail feathers
